subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rocco Baldelli slapped a belt-high fastball though the left side of the infield to score the go-ahead run as the Rays finally outlasted the Red Sox, 3-1.
snippet: Rocco Baldelli slapped a belt-high fastball though the left side of the infield to score the go-ahead run as the Rays finally outlasted the Red Sox, 3-1.
